content:
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/releases/tag/1.18.0-preview is released! Big thanks to @BWPanda for making the creation of the release notes a lot easier thanks to https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4859

Release 1.18.0-preview · backdrop/backdrop
This is the preview release of the next version of Backdrop. The official 1.18.0 version will be released January 15, 2021. Please use this version to test new features and ensure compatibility bef...
Automate release notes for minor releases · Issue #4859 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
@quicksketch asked me to look into a better system of automatically generating release notes when a minor release is published. Currently drush rn is used, but it includes a bunch of commits that a...

@BWPanda++ ...you don't get enough credit for all the automation tasks you've been working on for us, like https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4859 for example. Thanks so so much :pray:

Automate release notes for minor releases · Issue #4859 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
@quicksketch asked me to look into a better system of automatically generating release notes when a minor release is published. Currently drush rn is used, but it includes a bunch of commits that a...

I updated the Release Notes procedure document: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/blob/master/procedures/core--release-notes.md

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.
Here's some more karma for you @BWPanda ++ :smile:
